text: Ben Folds Five was an American alternative rock band from 1993 to 2000. Even though the band was called Ben Folds Five, it only had three members. Ben Folds, who was also the band's lead singer, played piano, Robert Sledge played bass, and Darren Jessee played drums. The band's biggest hits were "Brick" and "Underground". == Albums == * Ben Folds Five (1995) * Whatever and Ever Amen (1997) * Naked Baby Photos (1998) * The Unauthorized Biography of Reinhold Messner (1999) * The Sound of the Life of the Mind (2012) Category:American rock bands Category:Musical groups from North Carolina
title: Ben Folds Five
